audioJson.name: PlayTape
audioJson.fact1: This format was a two-track system, intended to compete with 4-track and 8-track cartridges
audioJson.fact2:
PlayTape were issued in different colors according to the content:
    Red cartridge (two songs)
    Black cartridge (four songs)
    White cartridge (eight songs)
    Blue cartridge (children)
    Gray cartridge (educational)
audioJson.fact3: This format was intended to be portable and to be installed in cars
